analysis.description:
PhoneCoin.startDate (/unique_chucks/29/0xea29c474a0bea831c5bc7107801b25e11a5e6a65.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xea29c474a0bea831c5bc7107801b25e11a5e6a65.sol#222-234)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0xea29c474a0bea831c5bc7107801b25e11a5e6a65.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/29/0xea29c474a0bea831c5bc7107801b25e11a5e6a65.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xea29c474a0bea831c5bc7107801b25e11a5e6a65.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
